page.title: 03SUPERNATURAL
page.content: Hobstone's Farm,which maybe observed near the edge of Lake Burwain as one looks towards the sailing club from Red Lane,has traditionally been the venue of hauntings and strange happenings.Inhabitants have reported the movement of an oak wardrobe which only two men could replace,and milk bottles and other objects being flung mysteriously about. On the night of Sept 29th 1977 the house was beseiged by demons when the walls,ceiling and roofslates were severely shaken and windows smashed.There were believed to be 3 ghosts:a child full of mischief,an old lady reluctant to depart this life,and an aggressive farmer who had been resident two centuries ago and who resented the then occupants.Some believe one ghost was a monk.Since the 77 excorcism the farm has been silent.
